data.actual_result: There is no date shown for when the first message (or any messages on the first day) were originally posted
data.expected_result: Shows a line break with the date just above the first message
data.short_description: Compact mode does not display the date for the first message in a text channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Change view to Compact (User Settings > Appearance > Message Display) - Scroll up to the top of any text channel
